<details><summary>Edit file: /Users/cleberdasilvahensel/Desktop/source/ono-sendae/ia-book/rename_files.py</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 77, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,77 @@
- 
+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ """
+ Script para renomear arquivos na pasta original/ com base no mapeamento definido.
+ """
+ 
+ import os
+ import json
+ import shutil
+ from pathlib import Path
+ 
+ def load_rename_mapping():
+     """Carrega o mapeamento de renomea√ß√£o do arquivo JSON."""
+     with open('rename_mapping.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+         data = json.load(f)
+     return data['rename_mapping']
+ 
+ def rename_files():
+     """Executa a renomea√ß√£o dos arquivos baseado no mapeamento."""
+     original_dir = Path('original')
+     
+     if not original_dir.exists():
+         print("‚ùå Pasta 'original/' n√£o encontrada!")
+         return
+     
+     # Carrega o mapeamento
+     rename_mapping = load_rename_mapping()
+     
+     print("üîÑ Iniciando processo de renomea√ß√£o...")
+     print(f"üìÅ Diret√≥rio: {original_dir.absolute()}")
+     print(f"üìã {len(rename_mapping)} arquivos para processar\n")
+     
+     renamed_count = 0
+     skipped_count = 0
+     
+     for old_name, new_name in rename_mapping.items():
+         old_path = original_dir / old_name
+         new_path = original_dir / new_name
+         
+         # Verifica se o arquivo original existe
+         if not old_path.exists():
+             print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è  Arquivo n√£o encontrado: {old_name}")
+             skipped_count += 1
+             continue
+         
+         # Se o nome √© o mesmo, pula
+         if old_name == new_name:
+             print(f"‚úÖ {old_name} (j√° com nome correto)")
+             skipped_count += 1
+             continue
+         
+         # Se o arquivo de destino j√° existe, cria backup
+         if new_path.exists():
+             backup_path = new_path.with_suffix(new_path.suffix + '.backup')
+             print(f"‚ö†Ô∏è  Arquivo destino j√° existe. Criando backup: {backup_path.name}")
+             shutil.move(str(new_path), str(backup_path))
+         
+         # Executa a renomea√ß√£o
+         try:
+             shutil.move(str(old_path), str(new_path))
+             print(f"‚úÖ {old_name} ‚Üí {new_name}")
+             renamed_count += 1
+         except Exception as e:
+             print(f"‚ùå Erro ao renomear {old_name}: {e}")
+             skipped_count += 1
+     
+     print(f"\nüìä Processo conclu√≠do:")
+     print(f"   ‚úÖ Renomeados: {renamed_count}")
+     print(f"   ‚è≠Ô∏è  Pulados: {skipped_count}")
+     print(f"   üìÅ Total processados: {renamed_count + skipped_count}")
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     try:
+         rename_files()
+     except KeyboardInterrupt:
+         print("\n‚ùå Processo interrompido pelo usu√°rio")
+     except Exception as e:
+         print(f"\n‚ùå Erro inesperado: {e}")
```

</details>
